articles.content:
Foreigners tour Mt. Paektu
   Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Members of the missions of the World Food Program, the UN Development Program and the UN Children's Fund in the DPRK visited Mt. Paektu area from July 11 to 13.   The visitors laid bouquets before the statue of the President  Kim  Il Sung standing by Lake Samji.   They visited General Secretary  Kim  Jong Il's old home at the secret camp on Mt. Paektu and planted trees before climbing Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of the revolution.   They also went round the Chongbong bivouac, the monument to the victorious battle in Musan area and the Taehongdan county integrated farm.

articles.content:
Friendly meeting with officials of Cuban embassy
   Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- A friendly meeting with officials of the Cuban embassy in Korea was held at Korea-Cuba Friendship Moranbong Senior Middle School no. 1 Wednesday in the month of solidarity with the Cuban people.   Secretary of the central committee of the Kim  Il Sung Socialist Youth League Kim  Kyong Ho, vice-chairman of the Korea-Cuba solidarity committee, was present at the meeting.   Invited there were Cuban ambassador to Korea Jose Manuel Inclan Embade and the embassy officials.   The participants saw an art performance given by the pupils and played sports and amusement games.

articles.content:
Korean books presented to Nepal 
    Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of presenting Korean books was held on July 8 at the Basstula Middle School, Baktapur, Nepal, on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of the President  Kim  Il Sung's passing away.   Reminiscences of the President  "With the Century" was presented to the school at the ceremony.   The principal and public figures said that the reminiscences of the President  is a precious textbook that should be read and studied by all from politicians to ordinary people.

Gift from Kim  Jong Il to Cambodian King
   Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary  Kim  Jong Il sent a gift to Norodom Sihanouk, Cambodian King, on an official goodwill visit to Korea.   The gift was handed over to Norodom Sihanouk by Kim  Yong Nam, President  of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today.

Aid materials from Cuba here
   Pyongyang, July 15 (KCNA) -- Materials provided to the DPRK free by the Cuban government in aid for the development of poultry farming and stockbreeding  arrived here on July 13.   This will encourage the Korean people in building a powerful socialist nation.
